metadata.title: Space Jam (Space Paste) - A Legal Psychedelic Recipe
metadata.significance: Early systematic analysis of Space Paste chemistry - predates modern oilahuasca theory

69ron_chemical_analysis.description: 69ron's breakdown of why each ingredient works - remarkably prescient for 2010

mechanisms: Piperine enhances effects of many drugs
Piperine may enhance bioavailability of curcumin by 2000% in humans

turmeric.mechanism: Selective monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI) of type MAO-A - should increase effectiveness of both elemicin and myristicin
turmeric.synergy: Combined with black pepper, curcumin should be many times more effective

mechanisms: Eugenol said to boost effects of psychedelics
Cinnamolaurine looks like a psychedelic on its own
Cinnamolaurine might require MAOI to be active (provided by turmeric)

basil.mechanism: Selectively binds to cannabinoid receptor type-2 (CB2) - might potentiate effects of myristicin and elemicin

almonds_pistachios.mechanism: Fats and oils aid digestion of psychedelic essential oils myristicin and elemicin
almonds_pistachios.note: 69ron: 'SWIM knows from experience that elemicin needs something with it to help digest it or it's pretty much ineffective. SWIM uses milk for that. Maybe almonds and pistachios work better?'

key_insights_from_thread.69ron_on_recipe_design: This is not some half baked scene, it's very well thought out... The guy who put this together is an herb genius.
key_insights_from_thread.enzyme_inhibition_recognized: Evening Glory noted: 'What is done here is simply combining an hallucinogenic spice - nutmeg, with any and all legal spices that theoretically may potentiate the nutmeg' via MAOIs and cytochrome P450 inhibitors
key_insights_from_thread.nutmeg_oil_suggestion: 69ron suggested nutmeg essential oil or elemi oil would be better than whole nutmeg - 'The main toxins in nutmeg are NOT found in nutmeg essential oil'
key_insights_from_thread.dosing_insight: 69ron: 'SWIM has tried up to 0.5 ml of nutmeg essential oil and found it to be as good as acid with no side effects at that dose'

summary.context: User found recipe while searching for 'natural highs' during period of forced sobriety
summary.modifications: Used roasted pistachios instead of raw, omitted cayenne pepper
summary.dose: 2 tablespoons mixed in cinnamon spice tea
summary.onset: Buzz after 30 minutes, increasing in intervals
summary.experience: Almost identical to eating pot brownies - same euphoria, mild eye irritation, munchies, cottonmouth
summary.sleep: Very deep and relaxed, trouble waking
summary.hangover: Cottonmouth and tiredness, but not the 'horrible hangover' others reported
summary.second_dose: Next morning, 2 more tablespoons - 'stoned ALL DAY LONG'
summary.conclusion: Two tablespoons works great - horrible rumors probably from people who overdosed

original_recipe_source.author: J. Tye
original_recipe_source.subject: Space paste! (was Re: nutmeg as a hallucinogen)
instructions: Use only whole nutmeg, not pre-ground
Grind all ingredients with spice grinder or food processor
Mix in maple syrup until consistency of paste
Do not omit any ingredient, or it will NOT work

dosing.duration: May last a couple of days

community_discussion_highlights.ms_manic_minxx: Suggested using raw unpasteurized almonds and pistachios, and adding vanilla bean - 'Whole vanilla is LOADED with goodies'
community_discussion_highlights.jamie: Expressed concern about speedy/stimulant nature - 'nutmeg oil and elemi oil would make me anxious and restless for a day'
community_discussion_highlights.evening_glory_critique: Argued it's still fundamentally a nutmeg experience with enzyme inhibitors, questioned if it could compare to 'usual psychedelics'
community_discussion_highlights.69ron_response: Defended that it's 'not simply a nutmeg experience' and has 'much less side effects than whole nutmeg' according to those who tried it

historical_significance.context: This thread represents early systematic chemical analysis of Space Paste
prescient_observations: Recognition of CYP450 inhibition role (Evening Glory)
MAO inhibition from turmeric and pepper
Essential oil vs whole nut distinction
what_was_not_yet_known: Full CYP450 enzyme orchestra (CYP2E1, CYP2D6, etc.)

recipe_evolution_note.2024_oilahuasca_theory: Full mechanistic understanding with 17bHSD2, endogenous amines, etc.

69ron_dosing_calculations.elemi_oil: Roughly same potency as nutmeg oil but more fickle - sometimes doesn't work without milk or fats

protocol.taken_with: Milk, followed by peanut butter and honey sandwich
protocol.substitutions: Peanut butter for almonds, honey for syrup, left out other herbs

69ron_live_experiment.context: SWIM had almost complete tolerance to nutmeg oil (took it previous weekend and same morning)

timeline.1_hour: Colors brighter (like marijuana), very relaxed, slightly dreamy - this is from turmeric, NOT like nutmeg
timeline.1.5_hours: Mild smooth soft feeling like marijuana or passionflower, mild euphoria, something else hard to explain - more than just turmeric now
timeline.2_hours: Very mild psychedelic effects like ELEMICIN but NOT myristicin - unexpected! As if elemicin boosted but myristicin muted
timeline.3_hours: Peaked. Did NOT feel anything like nutmeg oil

69ron_live_experiment.key_finding: The turmeric and black pepper dramatically altered the effects of the nutmeg oil - felt more like elemicin than myristicin

cytochrome_P450_discovery.69ron_research: I did more research and found out that cytochrome P450 is responsible for destroying myristicin (and probably elemicin as well)
cytochrome_P450_discovery.curcumin_role: The curcumin is NOT being used as an MAOI. SWIM had a friend test harmaline (MAOI) with elemi oil - did not boost effects much. Curcumin is being used for its ability to INHIBIT cytochrome P450.

almond_role_clarified.mechanism: Almonds provide nut butter in which curcumin is SOLUBLE - curcumin is not water soluble, needs nut butter to digest
almond_role_clarified.chain_dependency: Pepper + almonds critical → Without them turmeric won't work → Without turmeric working myristicin won't work

cytochrome_P450_discovery.conclusion: If you remove any one piece, you break the chain, and potency drops like crazy

additional_community_insights.cumin_question: Kannamate asked about cumin's role - unanswered in thread

cinnamon_mazatec_use.practice: Mazatecs drink cinnamon tea right after mushroom ceremonies for 'specific opening and warming effects'
cinnamon_mazatec_use.note: Cinnamon not native to Mexico - suggests deliberate adoption

additional_community_insights.spicy_food_effects: jamie: 'I make really spicy foods and always get psychoactive effects - heated stimulation, endorphin rush, empathic feeling, especially with curry, pepper, ginger, nutmeg'
additional_community_insights.ginger_suggestion: mattimus suggested adding ginger for nausea
additional_community_insights.raw_vs_pasteurized: ms_manic_minxx suggested raw unpasteurized almonds and pistachios work better

69ron_final_assessment.quote: The guy who put together this Space Paste is an herb genius. If only he was here to tell us what science was behind all of the other pieces in this mix. Everything I researched so far looks rock solid and very well thought out. It's not just a random mix of potentiators.
69ron_final_assessment.key_insight: Every piece is needed - all pieces researched are definitely required for it to work properly
